word:
When all had eaten, the word went forth from lips that had blessed the bread, "Gather up the fragments, that nothing be lost." "Therefore they gathered them together, and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves, which remained over and above to them that had eaten." Then leading the minds of the miracle-fed men from the temporal to spiritual food, Christ represented Himself as Bread of eternal life. 


                         -187-
